      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UDPAdapter.Block

      Packet is atomary object for sending to socket.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UDPAdapter

        public UDPAdapter(com.icodici.crypto.PrivateKey ownPrivateKey,
                  com.icodici.crypto.SymmetricKey sessionKey,
                  NodeInfo myNodeInfo,
                  NetConfig netConfig)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Create an instance that listens for the incoming datagrams using the specified configurations. The adapter should start serving incoming datagrams immediately upon creation.
        Parameters:
        ownPrivateKey - is PrivateKey for signing requests
        sessionKey - is SymmetricKey with session
        myNodeInfo - is NodeInfo object described node this UDPAdapter work with
        netConfig - is NetConfig where all nodes data is stored
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong

      • sendBlock

        protected void sendBlock(UDPAdapter.Block block,
                         com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method extract list of DatagramPacket from sending UDPAdapter.Block and put all directly to the socket.
        Parameters:
        block - is UDPAdapter.Block to send.
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendAsDataBlock

        protected void sendAsDataBlock(UDPAdapter.Block rawDataBlock,
                               com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method prepare and sends raw UDPAdapter.Block as UDPAdapter.PacketTypes.DATA. Session for this sending should be already in the Session#EXCHANGING mode.
        Parameters:
        rawDataBlock - is raw UDPAdapter.Block with data.
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendHello

        protected void sendHello(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method create UDPAdapter.Block of Session#HELLO type. This is first step of creation and installation of the session.
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendWelcome

        protected void sendWelcome(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method create UDPAdapter.Block of Session#WELCOME type. When someone send us Session#HELLO typed UDPAdapter.Block, we should call this method.
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendKeyRequest

        protected void sendKeyRequest(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method create UDPAdapter.Block of Session#KEY_REQ type. We have sent Session#HELLO typed UDPAdapter.Block, and have got Session#WELCOME typed UDPAdapter.Block - it means we can continue handshake and sen request for session's keys.
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendSessionKey

        protected void sendSessionKey(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method create UDPAdapter.Block of Session#SESSION type. Someone who sent Session#HELLO typed UDPAdapter.Block, send us new Session#KEY_REQ typed UDPAdapter.Block - if all is ok we send session keys to. From now we ready to data exchange.
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendPacketAck

        protected void sendPacketAck(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session,
                             int blockId,
                             int packetId)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Each adapter will try to send packets until have got special UDPAdapter.Block with type UDPAdapter.PacketTypes.PACKET_ACK, that means receiver have got packet. So when we got packet call this method. Note that block can consist from some packets.
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        blockId - is id of block the packet belongs to.
        packetId - is packet we have got.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendAck

        protected void sendAck(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session,
                       int blockId)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Each adapter will try to send blocks until have got special UDPAdapter.Block with type UDPAdapter.PacketTypes.ACK, that means receiver have got block. So when we got block and all is ok - call this method. Note that block can consist from some packets and for got packets needs to call sendPacketAck(Session, int, int).
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        blockId - is id of block we have got.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • sendNack

        protected void sendNack(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session,
                        int blockId)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Each adapter will try to send blocks until have got special UDPAdapter.Block with type UDPAdapter.PacketTypes.ACK, that means receiver have got block. So when we got block, but something went wrong - call this method. Note that for success blocks needs to call sendAck(Session, int)
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.
        blockId - is id of block we have got.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if something went wrong

      • getOrCreateSession

        protected com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session getOrCreateSession(int remoteId,
                                                                                   java.net.InetAddress address,
                                                                                   int port)
        If session for remote id is already created - returns it, otherwise creates new Session
        Parameters:
        remoteId - is id of remote party.
        address - is InetAddress of remote party.
        port - is port number of remote party.
        Returns:

      • checkUnsent

        protected void checkUnsent()
        Method checks blocks in the sending queue. If block still in the queue method increment it UDPAdapter.Block.sendAttempts value. If that value become above DatagramAdapter.RETRANSMIT_MAX_ATTEMPTS block remove from queue. After that if some sessions was had that blocks and blocks was removed - remove that sessions as possible broken. Calls from timer.

      • checkUnsentPackets

        protected void checkUnsentPackets(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
        Check unsent (or not delivered, i.e. without UDPAdapter.PacketTypes.PACKET_ACK answer) packets and try to resend it.
        Parameters:
        session - is Session in which sending is.

      • sendWaitingBlocks

        protected void sendWaitingBlocks(com.icodici.universa.node2.network.UDPAdapter.Session session)
        Before sending high-level data (stored in the UDPAdapter.Block with type UDPAdapter.PacketTypes.DATA), we need to install session. So prepared UDPAdapter.Block with type UDPAdapter.PacketTypes.DATA is stored at waiting blcoks and wait until seesion will turn to Session#EXCHANGING mode. After that we call this method.
        Parameters:
        session -

      • callErrorCallbacks

        protected void callErrorCallbacks(java.lang.String message)
        Use DatagramAdapter.addErrorsCallback(Function) to add callback to catch errors. This method call this backs.
        Parameters:
        message -

        Method prints some info about UdpAdapter.
